title: FLORAL JACQUARD CARDIGAN
desc: Oversized cardigan in particularly lightweight pure cotton fabric. The item, presented at the Spring-Summer 25 Women's Runway Show, features a contrasting, stencil-like jacquard floral motif and a belt that ties at the waist.• Oversized fit• V-neck• Long sleeves• Patch pockets on the front• Detachable waist belt• Made in Italy• The model is 5' 9½" (177 cm) tall and wears a size S
